proof:
Proof. For all $P \in \mathcal{P}$, by Lemma 3.1 on $H[P]$ and $d_{\text{remove}}$, there is a graph $R_P$ with degree $\leq d_{\text{remove}}$ s.t. the maximum clique size in $H[P] - R_P$ is $\leq 16 \ln(n) \frac{d_{\text{filter}}}{d_{\text{remove}}} + 10$.
We take $R := \cup_{P \in \mathcal{P}} R_P$. Thus, the largest clique in $(H - R)[P] = H[P] - R_P$ has size $\leq 16 \ln(n) \frac{d_{\text{filter}}}{d_{\text{remove}}} + 10$.
